name: こえんちゅ！代乃木声優物語 ～空と君とあの夏と～
summary: Souta is a voice acting student at a technical school in Japan. He aspires to be a great voice actor one day, but it's turning out to be a lot more complicated than he planned. Girls, festivals, plays - aliens?? Lead Souta to his destiny!
info:
• 别名: Koenchu! Yonogi Seiyuu Monogatari ~Sora to Kimi to Ano Natsu to~
  • 别名: Koenchu! -The Tale of the Voice Actress-
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2008/8/16
